title: A touch-stone of grace Discouering the differences betweene true and counterfeit grace: laying downe infallible euidences and markes of true grace: seruing for the triall of a mans spirituall estate. By A.H. Bachelor in Diuinitie, and Minister of Gods Word at Cranham in Essex.
author: Harsnett, Adam, 1579 or 80-1639.
publisher: Printed by R. B[adger] for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
